thread.title: BRIEF-Capitec Bank Says ‍Capital Group Companies Acquired 5.1105% Interest In Co

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Capitec Bank Says ‍Capital Group Companies Acquired 5.1105% Interest In Co

organizations.name: brief-capitec bank says ‍capital group companies acquired 5.1105% interest in co

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Capitec Bank Holdings Ltd:
* ‍CAPITAL GROUP COMPANIES HAVE ACQUIRED AN INTEREST IN ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL OF CAPITEC​
* ‍CAPITAL GROUP COMPANIES ACQUIRED AN INTEREST IN ORDINARY SHARE CAPITAL OF CAPITEC AMOUNTING TO 5.1105% OF TOTAL SHARE CAPITAL OF CAPITEC​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
